info.name: F-List WX Blue (New Site Desktop Width)
info.description:
This changes some of the code used to make the site mobile/portrait friendly that also impacts the desktop/landscape experience.
- Profiles: Full width
- Profiles: horizontal menu
- Profiles: stats in sidebar
- Profile Gallery: border removal
- Guestbook: staggered post/reply

DARK THEME can be found at:
http://userstyles.org/styles/188057

DO NOT post feedback here. Contact me on F-List at Weapon X.
info.additionalInfo:
